title: Jibaku-kun (Bucky: The Incredible Kid)
synopsis: Bucky, the protagonist of the history, is a normal boy that lives in the first world. He lives with a single and humble ambition: to dominate the world (in the sense of the whole planet). He is very certain and he would certainly die to reach his dream.
voices: ['Ishida, Akira', 'Kawakami, Tomoko', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Matsumoto, Yasunori', 'Morikubo, Shoutarou', 'Takayama, Minami', 'Hiramatsu, Akiko']
staff: [['Suzuki, Iku', ['Director']], ['Kasai, Kenichi', ['Episode Director']], ['Kakudou, Hiroyuki', ['Storyboard']], ['Takayama, Minami', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
